DefaultLogFormatter

The DefaultLogFormatter is a basic implementation of the LogFormatter protocol.

This implementation is used by default if no other log formatters are specified.

  • includeTimestamp

    Undocumented

  • includeThreadID

    Undocumented

  • init(includeTimestamp:includeThreadID:)

    Initializes the DefaultLogFormatter using the given settings.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(includeTimestamp: Bool = false, includeThreadID: Bool = false)

    Parameters

    includeTimestamp

    If true, the log entry timestamp will be included in the formatted message.
    includeThreadID

    If true, an identifier for the calling thread will be included in the formatted message.
  • formatLogEntry(_:)

    Returns a formatted representation of the given LogEntry.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func formatLogEntry(entry: LogEntry)
        -> String?

    Parameters

    entry

    The LogEntry being formatted.

    Return Value

    The formatted representation of entry. This particular implementation will never return nil.

  • formatLogMessageWithSeverity(_:caller:message:)

    Returns the formatted log message given the string representation of the severity, caller and message associated with a given LogEntry.

    This implementation is used by the DefaultLogFormatter for creating the log messages that will be recorded.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func formatLogMessageWithSeverity(severity: String, caller: String, message: String)
        -> String

    Parameters

    severity

    The string representation of the log entry’s severity.
    caller

    The string representation of the caller’s source file and line.
    message

    The log message.

    Return Value

    The formatted log message.

  • stringRepresentationOfSeverity(_:)

    Returns a string representation of a given LogSeverity value.

    This implementation is used by the DefaultLogFormatter for creating string representations for representing the severity value of LogEntry instances.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func stringRepresentationOfSeverity(severity: LogSeverity)
        -> String

    Parameters

    severity

    The LogSeverity for which a string representation is desired.

    Return Value

    A string representation of the severity value.

  • stringRepresentationForCallingFile(_:line:)

    Returns a string representation for a calling file and line.

    This implementation is used by the DefaultLogFormatter for creating string representations of a LogEntry’s callingFilePath and callingFileLine properties.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func stringRepresentationForCallingFile(filePath: String, line: Int)
        -> String

    Parameters

    filePath

    The full file path of the calling file.
    line

    The line number within the calling file.

    Return Value

    The string representation of filePath and line.

  • stringRepresentationForPayload(_:)

    Returns a string representation of an arbitrary optional value.

    This implementation is used by the DefaultLogFormatter for creating string representations of LogEntry payloads.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func stringRepresentationForPayload(entry: LogEntry)
        -> String

    Parameters

    entry

    The LogEntry whose payload is desired in string form.

    Return Value

    The string representation of entry’s payload.

  • stringRepresentationForValue(_:)

    Returns a string representation of an arbitrary optional value.

    This implementation is used by the DefaultLogFormatter for creating string representations of LogEntry instances containing .Value payloads.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func stringRepresentationForValue(value: Any?)
        -> String

    Parameters

    value

    The value for which a string representation is desired.

    Return Value

    If value is nil, the string (nil) is returned; otherwise, the return value of stringRepresentationForValue(Any) is returned.

  • stringRepresentationForValue(_:)

    Returns a string representation of an arbitrary value.

    This implementation is used by the DefaultLogFormatter for creating string representations of LogEntry instances containing .Value payloads.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func stringRepresentationForValue(value: Any)
        -> String

    Parameters

    value

    The value for which a string representation is desired.

    Return Value

    A string representation of value.
